description:
Kevin Nealon (Saturday Night Live) and Justin talk about how they both grew up in CT, what it was like to be on SNL during Justin's favorite era, and he previews his new book "I Exaggerate: My Brushes With Fame." Plus Kevin regales us with stories of all the famous people he's met throughout his career. 


Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/lifeisshort.
